headline: Teledyne to Participate in Upcoming Investor Conferences
summary: THOUSAND OAKS, Calif., December 03, 2024--Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY) today announced that Jason VanWees, Vice Chairman, will participate in the following investor conferences:

headline: FLIR Introduces Scout Pro Thermal Monocular for Law Enforcement and Public Safety Professionals
summary: THOUSAND OAKS, Calif., December 03, 2024--The new Scout Pro offers exceptional situation awareness with its 32-degree field of view to detect humans up to 500 meters (1,640 feet) away.
